entries.original: MCP: add UA suffix when acting as a server; a few stability/compat tweaks
entries.translated: MCP: 서버로 작동할 때 UA 접미사 추가; 몇 가지 안정성/호환성 조정

entries.original: OSS: Broader `apply_patch` OSS compatibility.
Rollouts: initial groundwork and `rollout_path` included in responses.
entries.translated: Rollouts: 초기 준비 작업 및 `rollout_path`가 응답에 포함됨.

entries.original: TUI: Alt+Delete deletes the next word.
Protocol/Types: `ArchiveConversation` request; small exports and TS type improvements.
entries.translated: Protocol/Types: `ArchiveConversation` 요청; 소규모 내보내기 및 TS 타입 개선.

entries.original: CI/Build: faster tests with `nextest`, add `shear`; minor macOS permission adjustment.
entries.translated: CI/Build: `nextest`로 더 빠른 테스트, `shear` 추가; macOS 권한 소폭 조정.

entries.original: Docs: clarified shell quoting in config.
[#3395] Set a user agent suffix when used as a mcp server
entries.translated: MCP 서버로 사용될 때 사용자 에이전트 접미사 설정

entries.original: [#3394] alt+delete deletes the word to the right of the cursor (delete_forward_word)
[#3390] Do not send reasoning item IDs
[#3388] Replace config.responses_originator_header_internal_override with CODEX_INTERNAL_ORIGINATOR_OVERRIDE_ENV_VAR
[#3387] No fail fast
[#3380] Introduce rollout items
[#3374] tweak "failed to find expected lines" message in apply_patch
entries.translated: apply_patch에서 "예상된 줄을 찾지 못했습니다" 메시지 조정

entries.original: [#3357] fix: remove unnecessary #[allow(dead_code)] annotation
[#3353] feat: add ArchiveConversation to ClientRequest
[#3352] fix: include rollout_path in NewConversationResponse
[#3338] feat: Run cargo shear during CI
[#3334] allow mach-lookup for com.apple.system.opendirectoryd.libinfo
[#3323] chore: try switching to cargo nextest to speed up CI builds
entries.translated: CI 빌드를 가속화하기 위해 cargo nextest로 전환 시도

entries.original: [#3222] fix: LoginChatGptCompleteNotification does not need to be listed explicitly in protocol-ts
entries.translated: [#3222] LoginChatGptCompleteNotification은 protocol-ts에 명시적으로 나열할 필요가 없습니다.

entries.original: [#3270] feat(core): re-export InitialHistory from conversation_manager
[#3219] Generate more typescript types and return conversation id with ConversationSummary
entries.translated: [#3219] 더 많은 타입스크립트 타입 생성 및 ConversationSummary와 함께 대화 ID 반환

entries.original: [#3179] feat: POSIX unification and snapshot sessions
[#3169] Improve explanation of how the shell handles quotes in config.md
entries.translated: [#3169] config.md에서 셀이 따옴표를 처리하는 방법에 대한 설명 개선

entries.original: [#2811] Include apply_patch tool for oss models from gpt-oss providers with different naming convention (e.g. openai/gpt-oss-*)
entries.translated: [#2811] gpt-oss 제공자의 oss 모델에 대해 다른 명명 규칙을 사용하는 경우 apply_patch 도구 포함 (예: openai/gpt-oss-*)
